Topic.Title: Alibaba IPO to Bypass Hong Kong and Head to NASDAQ!

Message.Msg: My take is that no matter what YHOO is going higher once they announce the IPO. I agree depending the price of IPO depends how high YHOO can get more dollar to the share price. Like I said I hope Alibaba learned from FB IPO experience. I think YHOO is very exciting this stock this year duee to their Asian assets, both just unbelievable growth and more super news to come for these assets. YHOO is definitely a "no brainer" stock to own. I say easy money baby, just not too be greedy. MM will make all YHOO LONGS rich, yeah baby!!

Topic.Title: Notifications.

Message.Msg: Hmmm, I recieved notification on this post about 45 minutes ago. When I click now on the notification it took me to your response. Which I had already received notification on your reply to me hours ago. The only thing that has changed is you have a thumbs up. Mods, this seems to be a glitch, why would we need notification when someone else gets a reply or a thumbs up... that's crazy. I also receive an email daily with the first few posts from the previous day, and there are many replies to me that are duplcated...again seems like a glitch and may be oine of the reasons so many notifications come through without there being a reply or thumbs up directly on my post. Hopefully it gets corrected...and no I won't hold my breath. As to the outage, I only caught the tail end of it and I didn't really realize it was a couple of hours. No worse than all of the other techs that have been hit this past few weeks

Message.Title: Black man slabs to death a white teen girl on bus

It is suspected to be a random attack hate crime as the attacker and victim did not know each other. You can read more on dailymail. No coverage by Yahoo because black on white crimes don't exist. Message.Title: Another News that you will not hear Kara Say.
Message.Msg: In the last 12 months Yhoo has submitted 302 new patent for approval and has been granted 287 new ones. Since MM took charge they have submitted 159/granted 181. This year they have an average of 30% more submittals by month that last year. Be aware that all licensing agreements with AG, YJapan, FB, MSFT and even Google (they pay too) are pre-MM, now this will mean more revenues. Check the last one submitted: USER AUGMENTED REALITY FOR CAMERA-ENABLED MOBILE DEVICES. And check the last one granted: Dynamic in-page advertising (ads changes without reload). Hotmodel have you covered yet?

Message.Title: cant get over my ex
Message.Msg: so its been 8 months and i still cant forget about my ex. He was my everything and he always filled my head with thoughts of getting married. sometimes he would make me mad because he'd just act as if he didnt care. sometimes he wouldnt talk to me for weeks at a time at one time a whole year. then i would move on. hed call me out of the blue and id tell him i moved on, and he would get mad and hang up. id call him back and apolagize. It was a mentally abusive relationship. one time he had cuts on his arm. he told me it was my fault cuz i cheated on him. i did not cheat on him because he stoped talking to me for like 3 months. so this just kept going on. I know i should move on but you don't know how much this took out of me for this lasted for about two years. I can't move on because i keep feeling like somehow it was my fault :( i dont know why....he would just blame me for everything. im tired of holding on to this i saw on facebook he has a new girlfriend and last i heard shes having his baby. it was a smack in the face when i heard this, because i thought he really loved me... i cant stop thinking and wondering what i did wrong. i just thought him and me were meant to be and thought we really would get married like he always told me...can someone give me advice on this or can anyone relate? help...
